resources.string: Tap it to lock app
Tap it to unlock app
Open search box to search app by name
Hide app from the main screen
Show app icon
Enter edit mode
Move pictures into vault. Just select the pictures to be protected from gallery and put them in the vault.
Tap to select all photos
Move the selected photos out of the vault
Delete the selected photos permanently
Move the selected photos into vault. You can view photos in vault.
Move videos into vault. Just select the videos to be protected from gallery and put them in the vault.
Tap to select all videos
Move the selected videos out of the vault
Delete the selected videos permanently
Move the selected videos into the vault. You can watch videos in the vault.
Tap to add files
Tap to select all files in a folder
Tap to move the selected files out of the vault
Tap to delete the selected files permanently
"Tap to move the selected files into the vault. You can't view files in the vault."
